version_description: Victory counters, Bug fixes, New Languages.
Victory counters, Bug fixes, New Languages.

NEW GAMES: 
  ~ CHECKERS
  ~ FOUR IN A ROW

This week we've decided to add some of the most beloved and most requested classic board games.
As always, there's something new coming next week!

Notice any bugs? Have any thoughts or suggestions? Want to tell us what you had for lunch?
Let us know:
contact@gamepigeonapp.com
https://twitter.com/gamepigeonapp
https://facebook.com/gamepigeon

Thank you so much for your support!

NEW GAMES: 
  ~ CHECKERS

Thank you so much for your support!

- NEW GAME: TANKS
As always, new stuff coming out sometime next week!

Other:
- 9-BALL bug fixes
- Various fixes and improvements

Notice any bugs? Have any thoughts or suggestions? Want to tell us what you had for lunch?
contact@gamepigeonapp.com

- NEW GAME: TANKS
As always, new stuff coming out sometime next week!

Other:

Notice any bugs? Have any thoughts or suggestions? Want to tell us what you had for lunch?

- NEW GAME: WORD HUNT
Please update your iOS to the latest version if GamePigeon has suddenly stopped working for you. Settings>General>Software Update. 

This week: a new word game! More games coming very soon!

Other:
- Haptic feedback (for most games)
- iCloud win counter synchronization
- Reduced data usage.
- Bunch of bug fixes and improvements

Thanks to everyone who emailed us. Even though we are a little slow with replies, we have read every single message! Your feedback and suggestions are incredible, and your bug reports has been a tremendous help.!

As always, feel free to contact us:
contact@gamepigeonapp.com
https://twitter.com/gamepigeonapp
https://facebook.com/gamepigeon

- NEW GAME: WORD HUNT

This week: a new word game! More games coming very soon!

- iCloud win counter synchronization
- Reduced data usage.
- Bunch of bug fixes and improvements

Thanks to everyone who emailed us. Even though we are a little slow with replies, we have read every single message! Your feedback and suggestions are incredible, and your bug reports has been a tremendous help.!

As always, feel free to contact us:
contact@gamepigeonapp.com
https://twitter.com/gamepigeonapp
https://facebook.com/gamepigeon

- NEW GAME: MANCALA
Sorry for the delay, this week we are adding another one of our most requested classic games. More games are on the way!
- More bug fixes and improvements.

If you are using a beta version of iOS10 and GamePigeon has suddenly stopped working for you - then you should update your iOS to the latest stable version: Settings>General>Software Update. If you are still experiencing problems -  make sure you send us an email.

Also, please consider rating GamePigeon on the App Store. And as always, send us bugs and suggestions here:
contact@gamepigeonapp.com
https://twitter.com/gamepigeonapp
https://facebook.com/gamepigeon

- NEW GAME: MANCALA
Sorry for the delay, this week we are adding another one of our most requested classic games. More games are on the way!
- More bug fixes and improvements.

If you are using a beta version of iOS10 and GamePigeon has suddenly stopped working for you - then you should update your iOS to the latest stable version: Settings>General>Software Update. If you are still experiencing problems -  make sure you send us an email.

Also, please consider rating GamePigeon on the App Store. And as always, send us bugs and suggestions here:
contact@gamepigeonapp.com
https://twitter.com/gamepigeonapp
https://facebook.com/gamepigeon

- NEW GAME: SHUFFLEBOARD
- NEW GAME: CHESS
- AVATAR ACCESSORIES
Other:
- Mancala bug fixes
- 8 Ball pocket bounce fix (if both players running the latest version)
- 8 Ball disappearing ball bug fix

Sorry for the delays. This week, two new games -  a new shuffleboard type of game, and chess! Hope you enjoy it :)
GamePigeon now also features a bunch of cool avatar accessories and customization. Hats, glasses, bowties, mustaches, backgrounds..you name it - we got it. We will be adding more accessories in the future updates as well. 
Avatar accessories is a premium feature, so if you are having a great time with GamePigeon and want to see us continue making more awesome stuff - then consider purchasing the upgrade.

Once again, we would like to thank our amazing community of players who keep sending us bug reports and their brilliant ideas. Thank you so much for your help in making GamePigeon better for everyone!

MORE GAMES ARE COMING SOON. STAY TUNED!

If you are using a beta version of iOS10 and GamePigeon has suddenly stopped working for you - then you should update your iOS to the latest stable version: Settings>General>Software Update. If you are still experiencing problems -  make sure you send us an email.

Consider rating GamePigeon on the App Store. And send us bugs and suggestions to our email (we can't reply to everybody but we read everything):
contact@gamepigeonapp.com
https://twitter.com/gamepigeonapp
https://facebook.com/gamepigeon

- NEW GAME: SHUFFLEBOARD
- NEW GAME: CHESS
- AVATAR ACCESSORIES
Other:
- Mancala bug fixes
- 8 Ball pocket bounce fix (if both players running the latest version)
- 8 Ball disappearing ball bug fix

Sorry for the delays. This week, two new games -  a new shuffleboard type of game, and chess! Hope you enjoy it :)

Consider rating GamePigeon on the App Store. And send us bugs and suggestions to our email (we can't reply to everybody but we read everything):
contact@gamepigeonapp.com
https://twitter.com/gamepigeonapp
https://facebook.com/gamepigeon

Introducing GamePigeon 2.0

- Redesigned Game Launcher
- Redesigned Avatars
- Auto send
- Dynamic Preview with game results.
- Improved iPhone X support.
- Bug fixes

Over the last few months we were introducing awesome new features such as Auto Send and Live preview, and today we are culminating it with the release of GamePigeon 2.0, which features an improved Game Launcher and redesigned Avatars. There is still lots more to improve and we'll do just that. And most importantly, there are more games coming very soon.


If you notice any new bugs, then please send us an email: contact@gamepigeonapp.com
